articles.title: Sun-watcher SOHO celebrates thirty years - European Space Agency
articles.description: On 2 December 1995 the ESA/NASA Solar and Heliospheric Observatory (SOHO) blasted into space – on what was supposed to be a two-year mission. From its outpost 1.5 million km away from Earth in the direction of…
articles.content:

On 2 December 1995 the ESA/NASA Solar and Heliospheric Observatory (SOHO) blasted into space on what was supposed to be a two-year mission.
